title: Low Priority queue after remake?
body:
So i failed to connect to riots server (eventhough i connected on the same network with another account to a different game), the game ends quick due to remake... ok ok... Then everyone reports the account and i get lwo priority queue with 20min waiting time between queues for my "alleged mistake"....

I didnt ruin anyones game experience. My client and my internet works fine. What is the point.? (besides, everyone has remake as an option duh)
